title: Restaurants throw out good food, is it permissible for me to take it #ramadan #islam assim al hakeem
transcript: my question was some large restaurants throw out fresh and good food every night and they do not care about it is it permissible if I take that food for consumption like what is the ruling on this do you work in that restaurant no then you can't take it if they're giving it away there's no problem if the food is halal there's no problem at all if you do that with the permission of the management or if you take it from the garbage can
